content: Sporting event delegation **[Singapore](/wiki/Singapore)** participated at the [2010 Asian Para Games](/wiki/2010_Asian_Para_Games)—First Asian Para Games in [Guangzhou](/wiki/Guangzhou), [China](/wiki/China) from 13 to 19 December 2010. Athletes from Singapore achieved four bronze medals only. The Chef-de-Mission of the delegation was Mr. Henry Tan. ## Medalists MedalNameSportEvent Bronze[Theresa Goh](/wiki/Theresa_Goh)[Swimming](/wiki/Swimming_at_the_2010_Asian_Para_Games)Women’s 50m Backstroke S5 Bronze[Theresa Goh](/wiki/Theresa_Goh)[Swimming](/wiki/Swimming_at_the_2010_Asian_Para_Games)Women’s 50m Freestyle S5 BronzeMohamed Ismail Hussain Thomas Yong Phen Chong[Bowling](/wiki/Bowling_at_the_2010_Asian_Para_Games)Doubles TPB1+TPB3 BronzeRex Tan Swang Hee Anuar Said[Bowling](/wiki/Bowling_at_the_2010_Asian_Para_Games)Doubles TPB8+TPB10 This article about sports in Singapore is a stub. title: Singapore at the 2010 Asian Para Games
